item.title: Game Producer's To Do List
item.description: Pekerjaan produser yang paling penting adalah planning, tapi jika ada (dan pasti ada) masalah, jangan takut untuk menrubah plan yang ada, jangan terlalu terikat dengan plan, tapi pastikan tetap fokus ke tujuan yang ingin dicapai.

item.title: Habits of Effective Artist - Andrew Price/Blender Guru
item.description: Presentasi Andrew Price/Blender Guru di Blender Conference 2016. Walau judul dan study casenya di bidang art, saya rasa tetap berguna untuk kita yang bekerja di bidang kreatif seperti writing, coding, etc.

item.title: Turn the Ship Around! | Book Review
item.description: This book is a journal of the transformation of the USS Santa Fe from an sub-par into an exceptional team. The author, captain himself, describe his thought process of very major change he did to transform his team members. This book gives a lot of insight for leaders to build their members into potential future leaders. The best thing is, because it was based on true events, we got a clear and practical picture of the implementation of those insights within USS Santa Fe.
